# 自动检查并安装缺失包的脚本（理科生的自动化思维）
required_packages <- c("ggplot2", "plotly", "DT", "dplyr")
new_packages <- required_packages[!(required_packages %in% installed.packages()[,"Package"])]
if(length(new_packages)) install.packages(new_packages, repos = "[https://cran.rstudio.com/](https://cran.rstudio.com/)")
